comments:
Using Eclipse 1.0 build 0.137

1) I imported some Java classes into the workbench
2) Made a simple change to a method in one of the classes
3) Selected that method in outline view and right clicked and selected Replace 
From Local History
4) Since total of only one change only one previous method to choose from in 
the history
5) Click ok and things go whacko, consider the following dump in the .log file:
